code: if (FALSE) { try({ results_wide <- nbl_results(wide_or_long="wide") results_long <- nbl_results(wide_or_long="long") }) }

nblR (development version)
text: Loaders now load data rather just seasons (0.0.0.2000) First release: * nbl_results() get match results since 1979 * nbl_shots() shooting location since 2015-2016 season * nbl_pbp() play--play data since 2015-2016 season * nbl_box_team() team box score data since 2015-2016 season * nbl_box_player() player box score data since 2015-2016 season
